channel.title: Comments on: Another Funny Ad Video
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
It's not about finding a website with a lot of videos. I mean... Meta Cafe is ok, but on my blog I post videos that _I_ think are funny or interesting. It's also about finding videos that stand out in a way.
Also, Google Video is great because you can really get a good picture quality as your connection allows. In Meta Cafe sometimes the streams get stuck, which is annoying.
item.content:encoded:
It’s not about finding a website with a lot of videos. I mean… Meta Cafe is ok, but on my blog I post videos that _I_ think are funny or interesting. It’s also about finding videos that stand out in a way.

Also, Google Video is great because you can really get a good picture quality as your connection allows. In Meta Cafe sometimes the streams get stuck, which is annoying.

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description:
You can get many more at: http://www.metacafe.com/
I guess that now you'll realy have to come up with something to wrtie... ;-)
